fields.name: !forage list PER EXP
fields.value: Returns a list of forageables and the chance of seeing them based on the provided PER and EXP values (must be numbers).

fields.name: !wiki NAME
fields.value: Returns a screenshot of the item's info box and a link to the wiki page.

fields.name: !gild ATT
fields.value: Returns a list of gildings that match the given attribute name.

fields.name: !gem ATT
fields.value: Returns a list of gems that match the given attribute name.

fields.name: !status
fields.value: Returns the current server status (from the main page).
